short_description: maler gmbh gersdorf is a painting, plastering & wall covering services company based in germany.
long_description: suchen sie nach neuen möglichkeiten der modernen raumgestaltung, exakt abgestimmt auf ihre wünsche. die beiden malermeister steve schaarschmidt und thomas hahn bündeln ihr fachliches know-how, um das leistungsportfolio zu vergrößern und damit ihren kunden erweiterte und bessere angebote unterbreiten zu können.
generated_description: maler gmbh gersdorf is a painting and wallpaper company based in gersdorf, saxony. the company was formed on may 1, 2021, from the merger of schaarschmidt malerbetrieb and malerdesign hahn, both owned by master painters steve schaarschmidt and thomas hahn. maler gmbh gersdorf specializes in modern room design, offering services such as painting, wallpapering, facade work, and flooring. the company emphasizes reliability, cleanliness, and efficiency, supported by a specialized team of skilled professionals who undergo continuous training to stay updated with the latest color and style trends and techniques.
generated_business_tags: interior design services | facade work services | painting and wallpapering services | floor laying services
